articles.title: Binance Singapore Drops Application For Local Crypto Bourse - Bloomberg
articles.description: Binance Asia Services Ltd., the Singapore entity of Changpeng Zhao, has withdrawn its application for a license to run a cryptocurrency exchange, the company said.
